articles.title: Le flash sports du 7 février
articles.description: Retrouvez l'essentiel de l'actualité sportive avec votre Flash L'Équipe quotidien.
articles.content: Alexis Pinturault entame ses Mondiaux à domicile ; l'OM et le PSG préparent un nouveau classique (mercredi, 21h10) ; le FC Metz s'accroche à son rêve de montée en Ligue 1, et L'Équipe s'interroge sur… [+79 chars]

articles.author: Mike ReissESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: Tom Brady says he'll start with Fox Sports in 2024
articles.description: Tom Brady said on FS1's "The Herd with Colin Cowherd" that he'll begin his role as a broadcaster with Fox Sports in the fall of 2024.
articles.content:
Quarterback Tom Brady, who announced his retirement Feb. 1, said Monday that he won't begin his work as a sports broadcaster at Fox Sports until the fall of 2024.
"That's great for me," Brady in an … [+2023 chars]

articles.author: Greg Auman
articles.title: Tom Brady will join FOX's NFL broadcasts in Fall 2024
articles.description: Tom Brady has retired from the NFL after 23 years, but he's going to take a year off before he begins his next chapter in the broadcast booth with FOX Sports.
articles.content:
Tom Brady has retired from the NFL after 23 seasons, but he's going to take a year off before he begins his next chapter in the broadcast booth with FOX Sports.
